headline: KLA Corporation (KLAC) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of semiconductor manufacturing equipment maker KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) jumped 4.6% in the afternoon session after the company was named a top pick for 2026 by Jefferies amid a broader rally in the chip sector.

headline: Analysts Say This 1 Lesser-Known Chip Stock Is a Top Buy for 2026. Should You Add It to Your Portfolios Here?
summary: KLAC stock is gaining momentum after Jefferies grouped it with Nvidia and Broadcom as one of the best semiconductor buys for 2026.

headline: Will EUV Adoption in Logic and DRAM Lift ASML's Margins Over Time?
summary: ASML Holding's margins are increasingly tied to EUV adoption in logic and DRAM, as higher-priced tools and service revenues lift profitability over time.

headline: Leverage Shares by Themes expands its single stock Leveraged ETF suite to include NIO, SNAP, BIDU, CNC, KLAC, PBR, and VALE
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., Dec. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Leverage Shares by Themes expand their offering with seven new single stock leveraged ETFs, available for trading starting December 18, 2025. These products are designed to empower investors to amplify returns (up and down) and actively engage with the performance of Nio Inc., Snap Inc., Baidu Inc., Centene Corp., KLA Corp., Petroleo Brasileiro, and Vale The new ETFs are tailored to target a 200% exposure to the daily performance of their under

headline: Applied Materials: Engineering the AI Backbone
summary: The company is entering a powerful AI-driven up-cycle with record margins and strong execution, yet still trades at an unjustified discount to peers.
